entry.title: I/O polling options in OTP 21
entry.content: Erlang/OTP 21 will introduce a completely new IO polling implementation.
entry.summary: Erlang/OTP 21 will introduce a completely new IO polling implementation. This new implementation comes with a new set of tuneable parameters that can be used to get the most out of your system. This blog post describes the parameters and attempts to describe what they should be used for.
